description:
Dear,

I am using Mitaka RDO release on Controller and I am trying install nova-compute node using RDO on XenServer 7 (Dundee) with XenAPI driver.

I have successfully installed neutron on the XenServer. 

I am having a following bug while trying to install openstack-nova-compute:

Transaction check error:
  file /usr/libexec/qemu-bridge-helper from install of qemu-kvm-common-10:1.5.3-105.el7_2.4.x86_64 conflicts with file from package qemu-xen-2.2.1-4.36786.x86_64

Full output here: http://paste.openstack.org/show/506611/

Is there any change to fix this dependency?

Kind regards,
Michal.
title: nova-compute error while installing on XenServer 7

comments.content:
Dear,

I am using Mitaka RDO release on Controller and I am trying install nova-compute node using RDO on XenServer 7 (Dundee) with XenAPI driver.

I have successfully installed neutron on the XenServer. 

I am having a following bug while trying to install openstack-nova-compute:

Transaction check error:
  file /usr/libexec/qemu-bridge-helper from install of qemu-kvm-common-10:1.5.3-105.el7_2.4.x86_64 conflicts with file from package qemu-xen-2.2.1-4.36786.x86_64

Full output here: http://paste.openstack.org/show/506611/

Is there any change to fix this dependency?

Kind regards,
Michal.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~vanditboy

comments.content: This appears to be an upstream packaging issue, please report to RDO directly.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~sdague
